name: Kickoff Returner Pro
description:
The most addictive football game with one simple goal: score touchdowns!

You are the kick returner, drag your mouse to dodge between defenders until you reach the endzone. See how many touchdowns you can score before being tackled, but watch out! Just like in the pros the defenders will come at you in a variety of different formations.

With Kickoff Returner Pro you get extra features like practice mode and no ads!
